availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Rachel Cummins. Father of Elizabeth Cummins, Mary J. Cummins, William A Cummins, Rachel T. Cummins, Susan A. Cummins, Nancy E. Cummins, George Bell Cummins, Henry M. Cummins, and Henrietta Cummins. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 592
Find A Grave, Matthew Cummins (September 24,1817-January 25, 1907), Memorial #22465027, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/22465027 (accessed August 21, 2019).
